body_html:
This (TF's) behavior is also inconsistent with the behavior of the Google Python implementation (https://googlecloudplatform.github.io/google-cloud-python/latest/storage/blobs.html) for interacting with GCS.

E.g., performing the same read-write loop while using the provided "download_as_string()" has the expected result--i.e., it correctly pulls the updated file, each time this is invoked.
body_text:
This (TF's) behavior is also inconsistent with the behavior of the Google Python implementation (https://googlecloudplatform.github.io/google-cloud-python/latest/storage/blobs.html) for interacting with GCS.
E.g., performing the same read-write loop while using the provided "download_as_string()" has the expected result--i.e., it correctly pulls the updated file, each time this is invoked.
body:
This (TF's) behavior is also inconsistent with the behavior of the Google Python implementation (https://googlecloudplatform.github.io/google-cloud-python/latest/storage/blobs.html) for interacting with GCS.

E.g., performing the same read-write loop while using the provided "download_as_string()" has the expected result--i.e., it correctly pulls the updated file, each time this is invoked.
